title: ACCUclim climate data
description: A set of 7 temperature variables for the Queensland Wet Tropics Area in north-east Australia. The layers are generated using a Boosted Regression Tree statistical downscaling approach to transform existing coarse weather layers to fine-scale weather layers corrected for biotic and abiotic factors.
external_description: TBA - Most likely Tropical Data Hub w/ exposure via MediaFlux WebDev
attribution: Storlie, C.J., Phillips, B.L., VanDerWal, J.J., and Williams, S.E. (2013) Improved spatial estimates of climate predict patchier species distributions. Diversity and Distributions, 19 (9). pp. 1106-1113.
